column2: When his parents have to go out of town, Dennis stays with Mr. and Mrs. Wilson. The little menace is driving Mr. Wilson crazy, but Dennis is just trying to be helpful. Even to the thief who's arrived in town.
A LAPD detective is on the trail of a very handsome young man who had been seducing and slashing many young women to death.
While traveling with his father, young Alec becomes fascinated by a mysterious Arabian stallion who...
Grandpa Ward gives a horse he found to his grandchildren, who keep it in their tower-block flat in Dublin. The horse is stolen from them, and the two young boys set out to find it and flee on it.
A melon farmer battles organized crime and a hit man who wants to kill him.
An action-packed thriller starring Charles Bronson as Jack Murphy, a cop who is running to stay alive long enough to even the score with his wife's killer.
A blind, uneducated white girl is befriended by a black man, who becomes determined to help her escape her impoverished and abusive home life.
A young district attorney seeking to prove a case against a corrupt police detective encounters a former lover and her new protector...
Truncated adaptation of Stephen Crane's novel about a Civil War Union soldier who stuggles to find the courage to fight in the heat of battle.
A man and woman share a telephone line and despise each other, but then he has fun by romancing her with his voice disguised.
Thomas Jerome Newton is a humanoid alien who comes to Earth to get water for his dying planet. He starts...
A robbery homicide investigation triggers a series of events that will cause a corrupt LAPD officer to question his tactics.
The rise and fall of legendary war hero Thomas "Stonewall" Jackson as he leads the Confederacy to great success against the Union from 1861 to 1863. Prequel to the 1993 classic "Gettysburg".
A man against capital punishment is accused of murdering a fellow activist and is sent to death row.
Three friends attempt to recapture their glory days by opening up a fraternity near their alma mater.
A talented pool hustler who has stayed out of the game for years, must go back to his old ways when his little brother gets involved with his enemy, the very man who held him back from greatness.
A man returns to Victoria, Australia, where he grew up, and encounters a mysterious woman who reminds him of someone he once knew.
A jewel thief's daughter is kidnapped after he steals a collection of prized black diamonds, which aren't at all what they seem.
A mentally disturbed man takes residence in a halfway house. His mind gradually slips back into the realm created by his illness, where he replays a key part of his childhood.

Jack is now out of jail and he meets Nick, his adolescent son. Their relationship will be complicated, because Jack has a problem with alcohol. But his love for Nick will help him to get over the past and reach his dreams.
Four 1950s icons meet in the same hotel room and two of them discover more in common between them than they ever anticipated.
A filthy rich businessman bets a corporate rival that he can live on the streets of L.A. without the comforts of home or money, which proves to be tougher than he thought.
A high school teacher from a troubled inner city Washington D.C. neighborhood becomes a super-powered hero and takes on the gang that has been terrorizing his streets.
Mr. North, a stranger to a small, but wealthy, Rhode Island town, quickly has rumors started about him that he has the power to heal people's ailments...
A young alien (David Love) falls for a pretty teenage Earth girl (Dawn Anderson) and they team up to try to stop the plans of his invading cohorts...
Ten sequences examine the emotional lives of women at significant junctures.
When a lonely guy meets a woman on the Internet who happens to be in prison, she breaks out to be with him, and proceeds to wreak havoc on his middle-class life.
A Special-Ops commander leads his team into the Nigerian jungle in order to rescue a doctor who will only join them if they agree to save 70 refugees too.
Events over the course of one traumatic night in Paris unfold in reverse-chronological order as the beautiful Alex is brutally raped and beaten by a stranger in the underpass.
When an uptight young man and his fiancee move into his libertine mother's house, the resulting clash of life attitudes shakes everyone up.
A German Jewish refugee family moves to and adjusts to a farm life in 1930s Kenya.
A series of overlapping stories about four suburban families dealing with different maladies. Esther...
The daughter of orthodox Sikh rebels against her parents' traditionalism by running off to Germany with a football team (soccer in America).
A young man with an unusual connection to rats uses them at his own sociopathic will.
A young woman struggles with depression during her first year at Harvard. Based on Elizabeth Wurtzel's novel.
An out-of-control speed freak is introduced his drug of choice's creator by his dealer. A massive three-day adventure ensues.
An escaped prisoner and a stuffy law professor vie for the hand of a spirited schoolteacher.
Story of two men drag racing across the USA in a primer grey 55 chevy. Wilson is the mechanic, James Taylor is the driver.
The story of the friendship between a star pitcher, wise to the world, and a half-wit catcher, as they cope with the catcher's terminal illness through a baseball season.
Bio of swing band leader 'Benny Goodman' from age 10 (1919) to his landmark Carnegie Hall band concert in 1938...
Married couple  and  have longed lived in northern Kenya for George's work as the senior game warden of the region...
A businessman shows up in Washington to lobby agendas that are friendly to his construction plans. His...
A psychiatrist attempts to uncover a troubled stable boy's disturbing obsession with horses.
A boy in Nazi Germany, trying to conceal that he is Jewish, joins the Hitler Youth.
True story of the life of Jimmy Piersall, who battled mental illness to achieve stardom in major league baseball.
The biography of the Bandleader Glenn Miller from his beginnings to his death over the English Channel in December 1944...
A man wanting to stay in the US enters into a marriage of convenience, but it turns into more than that.
An Edinburgh professor and assorted colleagues follow an explorer's trail down an extinct Icelandic volcano to the earth's center.
A mysterious video kills whoever views it, unless that viewer can solve its mystery.
Reiko takes Yoichi into hiding when her son begins to display frightening powers. Meanwhile, Mai Takano and the authorities begin a desperate search for them, as the mysterious Ring curse spreads...
Taxi dancer Charity continues to have Faith in the human race despite apparently endless disappointments at its hands...
Two straight men mistakenly end up on a "gays only" cruise.
Friends on a camping trip discover that the town they're vacationing in is being plagued in an unusual fashion by parasitic aliens from outer space.
When Piglet comes up missing his Hundred Acre Wood friends use Piglet's own Book of Memories to find him, discovering along the way just how big a role he's played in their lives.
A small-town woman tries to achieve her goal of becoming a flight attendant.
Unfounded suspicions lead a married couple to begin divorce proceedings, whereupon they start undermining each other's attempts to find new romance.
Marcellus is a tribune in the time of Christ. He is in charge of the group that is assigned to crucify Jesus...
A DEA agent investigates the disappearance of a legendary Army ranger drill sergeant and several of his cadets during a training exercise gone severely awry.
The only way to save Earth from catastrophe is to drill down to the core and set it spinning again.
When a presidential candidate dies unexpectedly in the middle of the campaign, Washington, D.C. alderman, Mays Gilliam is unexpectedly picked as his replacement.
An American teenager learns that her father is a wealthy British politician running for office. Although she is eager to find him, she realizes it could cause a scandal and cost him the election.
An aging hitman gets a contract to kill a general in Buenos Aires. But when his mark becomes unavailable, he becomes involved in Argentinian tango culture.
In 1995 Director Steve James (Hoop Dreams) returned to rural Southern Illinois to reconnect with Stevie Fielding, a troubled young boy he had been an 'Advocate Big Brother' to ten years earlier.
A collection of tales based upon the actual dreams of director Akira Kurosawa.
A committed film director struggles to complete his movie while coping with a myriad of crises, personal and professional, among the cast and crew.
A potentially violent screenwriter is a murder suspect until his lovely neighbor clears him. But she begins to have doubts...
An aging gambler on a losing streak attempts to rob a casino in Monte Carlo. But someone's already tipped off the cops before he even makes a move.
Stuart Shepard finds himself trapped in a phone booth, pinned down by an extortionist's sniper rifle.
A terrorist explosion releases a deadly virus on the masses, and it's up the bounty-hunting Bebop crew to catch the cold-blooded culprit.
Documentary on comedian Eddie Griffin who heads back home to a family reunion, which includes two uncles - one a porn director and the other an ex-pimp.
The second part of Aki Kaurism√§ki's "Finland" trilogy, the film follows a man who arrives in Helsinki...
Dave Buznik is a businessman who is wrongly sentenced to an anger-management program, where he meets an aggressive instructor.
A group of over-achieving Asian-American high school seniors enjoy a power trip when they dip into extra-curricular criminal activities.
Two teenage couples traveling across the backwoods of Texas searching for urban legends of murder end up as prisoners of a bizarre and sadistic backwater family of serial killers.

Sixteen-year-old Lilja and her only friend, the young boy Volodja, live in Estonia, fantasizing about a better life. One day, Lilja falls in love with Andrej, who is going to Sweden, and invites Lilja to come along and start a new life.
Based on the very underground comic book, a Tibetan monk becomes a mentor to a young street kid whom he can teach to protect a scroll.
Mockumentary captures the reunion of 1960s folk trio the Folksmen as they prepare for a show at The Town Hall to memorialize a recently deceased concert promoter.
A wrongfully convicted boy is sent to a brutal desert detention camp where he joins the job of digging holes for some mysterious reason.

A senator arranges for his son, a rich white kid who fancies himself black, to be kidnapped by a couple of black actors pretending to be murderers to try and shock him out of his plans to become a rapper.
Documentary on the migratory patterns of birds, shot over the course of three years on all seven continents.
Four small gangsters from Copenhagen trick a gangster boss: they take over 4,000,000 kroner which they were supposed to bring him...
A young American and his English wife come to rural England and face increasingly vicious local harassment.
A group of scientists investigates a deadly new alien virus before it can spread.
A teenager is part of an interactive video game where he kills innocent victims. Later, the murders become real.
In an oppressive future, a fireman whose duty is to destroy all books begins to question his task.
First-time filmmaker and award-winning photographer Sam Jones documents the recording of Wilco's album, "Yankee Hotel Foxtrot."
District Attorney Tom Logan is set for higher office, at least until he becomes involved with defence...
A wise-cracking husband and wife team of ex-Spies arrive in New Orleans on maternity leave with their baby girl...
Molly is a high school track coach who knows just as much about football as anyone else on the planet...
An adaption of "The Wizard of Oz" that tries to capture the essence of the African American experience.
Rich playboy Charley Pearl meets Vicki Anderson, singer at a nightclub in Las Vegas. But she's a gangster's-moll...
Veronique, living with her divorced mother, is going on holiday to Mauritius with her father. To impress a local boy...
On their 16th anniversary a married couple's trip to a Beverly Hills mall becomes the stage for personal revelations and deceptions.

Jake Vig (Burns) is a consummate grifter about to pull his biggest con yet, one set to avenge his friend's murder. But his last scam backfired, leaving him indebted to a mob boss (Hoffman) and his enforcer.
Stranded at a desolate Nevada motel during a nasty rain-storm, ten strangers become acquainted with each other when they realize that they're being killed off one by one.
A documentary examining the decade of the 1970s as a turning point in American cinema. Some of today's best filmmakers interview the influential directors of that time.
In the midst of the Chechen War, a remote psychiatric institution is left without staff leaving the patients to fend for themselves. Based on a true story.
Spellbound follows eight teenagers on their quest to win the 1999 National Spelling Bee.
Lizzie McGuire has graduated from middle school and takes a trip to Rome, Italy with her class. And what was supposed to be only a normal trip, becomes a teenager's dream come true.
The X-Men band together to find a mutant assassin who has made an attempt on the President's life, while the Mutant Academy is attacked by military forces.
A troubled young woman is encouraged by a teacher to enter a poetry contest.
A police detective in a South American country is dedicated to hunting down a revolutionary guerilla leader.
A bank manager with: (a) a gambling problem and (b) access to a multimillion dollar account gets into a messy situation. Based on the story of the largest one-man bank fraud in Canadian history.
Two men get laid off and have to become stay-at-home dads when they can't find jobs. This inspires them to open their own day-care center.
A teacher and a gangster meet by chance in a small town pharmacy. As a friendship of sorts develops between these opposite personalities...
Quiet, unassuming Adam is changing in a major way, thanks to his new girlfriend, art student Evelyn. Adam's friends are a little freaked by the transformation.
Thirty-year-old Hlynur still lives with his mother and spends his days drinking, watching porn and surfing...
Hopefuls try out before a demanding director for a part in a new musical.
An aspiring DJ, from the South Bronx, and his best friend, a promoter, try to get into show business by exposing people to hip-hop music and culture.
A young boy and a girl with a magic crystal must race against pirates and foreign agents in a search for a legendary floating castle.
Kevin Laird is a Beverly Hills school teacher by day and a mystery man by night. Using his lambada dance...
Jonas Cord is a disagreeable rich young tycoon on the corporate make, with some subplots about booze, broads and Hollywood in the 1930's.
After writing a tell-all book about her days in the dance troupe "Barry Nichols and Les Girls", Sybil...
Lawman Wyatt Earp and outlaw Doc Holliday form an unlikely alliance which culminates in their participation in the legendary Gunfight at the O.K. Corral.
C.K. Dexter-Haven, a successful popular jazz musician, lives in a mansion near his ex-wife's Tracy Lord's family estate...
Fred and Lilly are a divorced pair of actors who are brought together by Cole Porter who has written a musical version of The Taming of the Shrew...

Neo and the rebel leaders estimate that they have 72 hours until 250,000 probes discover Zion and destroy it and its inhabitants. During this, Neo must decide how he can save Trinity from a dark fate in his dreams.
Aaaah... it's New York City in 1962, and love is blooming between a journalist and a feminist advice author, who's falling head over heels despite her beau's playboy lifestyle.
This documentary about the culture of intense cinephilia in New York City reveals the impassioned world of five obsessed movie buffs...
A strait-laced French student moves into an apartment in Barcelona with a cast of six other characters from all over Europe. Together, they speak the international language of love and friendship.
A guy who complains about God too often is given almighty powers to teach him how difficult it is to run the world.
Right before his daughter's wedding, a mild-mannered foot doctor discovers that his new in-laws are international smugglers.
After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.
After being betrayed and left for dead in Italy, Charlie Croker and his team plan an elaborate gold heist against their former ally.
Six people find themselves trapped in the woods of West Virginia, hunted down by "cannibalistic mountain men grossly disfigured through generations of in-breeding."

Documentary on the Friedmans, a seemingly typical, upper-middleclass Jewish family whose world is instantly transformed when the father and his youngest son are arrested and charged with shocking and horrible crimes.
A violin prodigy and his father travel to Beijing, where the father seeks the means to his son's success while the son struggles to accept the path laid before him.
Brian O'Conner and childhood friend Roman Pearce are re-united by the FBI to bring down a Miami drug exporter in exchange for clear records.
The story of a petty thief who meets an innocent young woman and brings her into his world of crime while she teaches him the lessons of enjoying life and being loved.
A contemporary story of love, rejection and triumph as a young Maori girl fights to fulfill a destiny her grandfather refuses to recognize.
A naive half-Indian, half-white man evolves into a hardened killer as he tracks down his parents' murderers.
A romantic and action packed story of three best friends, a group of high end art thieves, who come into trouble when a love-triangle forms between them.
In 1825 an English aristocrat is captured by Indians. He lives with them and begins to understand/accept their lifestyles. Eventually he is accepted as part of the tribe and becomes their leader.
In 1909, when John Fain's gang kidnaps Big Jake McCandles' grandson and hold him for ransom, Big Jake sets out to rescue the boy.
The military attempts to contain a manmade combat virus that causes death and permanent insanity in those infected, as it overtakes a small Pennsylvania town.
Almost in breadth and depth of a documentary, this movie depicts an auto race during the 70s on the...
Oscar-winning documentary that documents a murder trial in which a 15-year-old African-American is wrongfully accused of a 2000 murder in Jacksonville, Florida.
After the Civil War, Cord McNally searches for the traitor whose perfidy caused the defeat of McNally's unit and the loss of a close friend.
During a day in their honeymoon a couple is separated by the city's lust and the desires it produces.
The treasure seeking adventures of young Jim Hawkins and pirate captain Long John Silver.
Two horror tales based on short stories by Edgar Allan Poe directed by two famous horror directors, George A. Romero and Dario Argento.
During the housing shortage of the Summer Olympic Games in 1964, two men and a woman share a small apartment in Tokyo, and the older man soon starts playing Cupid to the younger pair.
Hilarious documentary on the wildlife of the Namib Desert.
When a town boss confiscates homesteader's supplies after gold is discovered nearby, a tough cowboy risks his life to try and get it to them.
Kent, the unscrupulous boss of Bottleneck has Sheriff Keogh killed when he asks one too many questions...
Sonny Steele used to be a rodeo star, but his next appearance is to be on a Las Vegas stage, wearing a suit covered in lights...
Cinecitta, the huge movie studio outside Rome, is 50 years old and Fellini is interviewed by a Japanese...
A fast-taking wheeler-dealer corporal in a Malaysian POW camp during WWII uses bribery and larceny to take de facto control of the camp from his senior officers.
In Shenandoah, Virginia, widower farmer Charlie Anderson lives a peaceful life with his six sons - Jacob...
Angelo "Snaps" Provolone made his dying father a promise on his deathbed: he would leave the world of crime and become an honest businessman...
Antoine and Kenny Tyler are NCAA college basketball players, and Antoine is the star. Suddenly Antoine...

Nun Sara is on the run in Mexico and is saved from cowboys by Hogan, who is preparing for a future mission to capture a French fort. The pair become good friends, but Sara never does tell him the true reason behind her being outlawed.
The journey of a prized rifle from one ill-fated owner to another parallels a cowboy's search for a murderous fugitive.
The July 3rd, 1973 historic concert of the 'leper Messiah'. This was to be David Bowie's last concert...
A group of young Marines have adventures in love and war.
A man travels around a city with a camera slung over his shoulder, documenting urban life with dazzling invention.
A platoon of special ops are tasked to parachute into the remote Burmese jungle and destroy a strategic Japanese radar station, but getting out isn't as easy.
During WWII, a submarine's second in command inherits the problem of torpedoes that don't explode. When on shore, he is eager to win back his ex-wife.
The story about the relationship between a rebellious 50s teenager and his abusive father, based on the memoirs of writer and literature professor Tobias Wolff.
When spy chief Bob Sharkey finds out one of his agents-in-training is actually a Nazi double agent, his strategic decision not to arrest him results in tragedy.
In 1945, an American Infantry company sets up an artillery observation post but tensions between captain Cooney and lieutenant Costa run high.
A renowned New York playwright is enticed to California to write for the movies and discovers the hellish truth of Hollywood.
In 1940, the British Royal Air Force fights a desperate battle vs. the Nazi Germany Air Force for control of British air space to prevent a Nazi invasion of Britain.
In 1931, a young soldier (Fernando) deserts from the army and falls into a country farm, where he is...

Texas Ranger Jake Cutter arrests gambler Paul Regret, but soon finds himself teamed with his prisoner in an undercover effort to defeat a band of renegade arms merchants and thieves known as Comancheros.
Lieutenant McAllister is ordered to transport several ammunition wagons to another fort through Apache...
After a plane crash in the Sahara, one of the survivors says he's an airplane designer and they can make a flyable plane from the wreckage.
A Marine and a Nun, The Marine is shipwrecked on a Pacific Island and the Nun has been left behind there, they find comfort in one another as the two wait out the war.

In this blend of documentary and fictional narrative from pioneering filmmaker Robert Flaherty, the everyday trials of life on Ireland's unforgiving Aran Islands are captured with attention to naturalistic beauty and historical detail.
A lawyer defends her father accused of war crimes, but there is more to the case than she suspects.
Sam and George strike gold in Alaska. George sends Sam to Seattle to bring George's fianc√©e back to Alaska...
The World War II story of the British Navy's effort to defeat Nazi Germany's most powerful warship.
A young pilot in the German air force of 1918, disliked as lower-class and unchivalrous, tries ambitiously to earn the medal offered for 20 kills.
The story of the final years of the respected World War II German general, Erwin Rommel.
An unassuming office worker is arrested and stands trial, but he is never made aware of his charges.
The neighbors of a frontier family turn on them when it is suspected that their adopted daughter was stolen from the local Kiawa tribe.
After the Civil War, ex-Union Colonel John Henry Thomas and ex-Confederate Colonel James Langdon are...
The life and times of Baltimore film maker and midnight movie pioneer, John Waters. Intercut with a...

Two dim-witted teenage boys, are forced to save the fast-food restaurant they work at from going out of business, despite a new-and-improved burger joint opening across the street that want to be the "Top Dog" in the fast food industry.
Queen Elizabeth I travels to late twentieth-century Britain to discover a tawdry and depressing landscape...
An Indian family is expelled from Uganda when Idi Amin takes power. They move to Mississippi and time passes...
Jenny Lamour wants to succeed in music hall. Her husband and accompanist is Maurice Martineau, a nice but jealous guy...
J.D. Cahill is the toughest U.S. Marshal they've got, just the sound of his name makes bad guys stop in their tracks...
Cattle baron John Chisum joins forces with Billy the Kid and Pat Garrett to fight the Lincoln County land war.
Eddie and Lou are a couple of two-bit con men on the lam from a loan shark. They hide out in someone's...
Dan Merrick comes out from a shattering car accident with amnesia. He finds that he is married to Judith...
In 1858 France, Bernadette, an adolescent peasant girl, has a vision of "a beautiful lady" in the city dump...
A no account outlaw establishes his own particular brand of law and order and builds a town on the edges of civilization in this farcical western...
Millie comes to town in the roaring twenties to encounter flappers, sexuality and white slavers.
Stewart McBain (Coleman) is a real-estate mogul who spends his living blowing up old buildings to make room to erect new buildings...
Set back in the 80s when Harry met Lloyd in high school where they cross paths with a mean principal and a bunch of other outcasts much like themselves.
Two LAPD detectives who moonlight in other fields investigate the murder of an up-and-coming rap group.
The Rugrats get tangled in an exotic adventure, where they're helped by the Thornberrys, a family that travels the world making nature documentaries.
During the Gorbachev years, Platon Makovski and his four buddies are university students who jump on the private capitalism movement...
A writer must turn out a novel in thirty days or face the wrath of loan sharks.
The true story of the departure of the German occupiers from Paris in 1944.
Murphy is the sole survivor of his crew, that has been massacred by a German U-Boat in the closing days of World War II...
In London in the 1970s, Scotland Yard police investigators think they have uncovered a case of vampirism...
Four weeks after a mysterious, incurable virus spreads throughout the UK, a handful of survivors try to find sanctuary.
The Angels investigate a series of murders which occur after the theft of a witness protection profile database.
A mourning son makes a deal to reanimate his one year dead mother, however things turn into an unexpected direction.
Two very different hitmen find themselves to be in each other's way. They use all their skill to solve the problem.
The Bank is a thriller about banking, corruption and alchemy.

An almost accidental romance is kindled between a German woman in her mid-sixties and a Moroccan migrant worker around twenty-five years younger. They abruptly decide to marry, appalling everyone around them.
Nick is a feckless television salesman who gets fired and impulsively decides that he and his girlfriend...
Jesus of Nazareth,the son of God raised by a Jewish carpenter. Based on the gospel of Luke in the New...
A vagabond Viking adventurer and a Moor both compete to find "The Mother of All Voices," a legendary golden bell near the Pillars of Hercules.
An opportunistic Russian businessman tries to pass a mysterious impostor as the Grand Duchess Anastasia. But she is so convincing in her performance that even the biggest skeptics believe her.
Babe Ruth becomes a baseball legend but is unheroic to those who know him.
In the Vietnam War, a bereaved US Navy A-6 Intruder tactical bomber pilot schemes with a hardened veteran to make an unauthorized air strike on Hanoi itself.
When an upwardly mobile couple find themselves unemployed and in debt, they turn to armed robbery in desperation.
Roger Willoughby is considered to be a leading expert on sports fishing. He's written books on the subject...
A fading baseball player is traded to a Japanese team and has trouble fitting into the society.
An American scholar in Greece sets about improving a prostitute he's infatuated with.
A high-class call girl accused of murder fights for the right to stand trial rather than be declared mentally incompetent.
In London, stuffy statesman Carter Harrison meets Toni, a Bohemian artist with a hot Italian temper...
In medieval France, young lawyer Richard Courtois leaves Paris for the simpler life in the country. However...
The accidental mix-up of four identical plaid over-night bags leads to a series of increasingly wild and wacky situations.
Bruce Banner, a genetics researcher with a tragic past, suffers an accident that causes him to transform into a raging green monster when he gets angry.
Elle Woods heads to Washington D.C. to join the staff of a congresswoman in order to pass a bill to ban animal testing.

The sailor of legend is framed by the goddess Eris for the theft of the Book of Peace, and must travel to her realm at the end of the world to retrieve it and save the life of his childhood friend Prince Proteus.

A cybernetic warrior from a post-apocalyptic future travels back in time to protect a 19-year old drifter and his future wife from a most advanced robotic assassin and to ensure they both survive a nuclear attack.
A British mystery author visits her publisher's home in the South of France, where her interaction with his unusual daughter sets off some touchy dynamics.
Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save his love, the governor's daughter, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.
In an alternate Victorian Age world, a group of famous contemporary fantasy, SF and adventure characters team up on a secret mission.
September of 1944, a few days before Finland went out of the Second World War. A chained to a rock Finnish...
Set in 1955, the residents of a small Montana community are forced to move their homes to make way for a new dam.
Two loose-cannon narcotics cops investigate the flow of Ecstacy into Florida.
A teenager (Moore), disillusioned by too many examples of love gone wrong, refuses to believe that true love exists. Then this new guy (Ford) comes along...
After a sudden attack on the MI5, Johnny English, Britain's most confident yet unintelligent spy, becomes Britain's only spy.
An illegal Nigerian immigrant discovers the unpalatable side of London life.
A homeless man and his young companion who survive by conning people meet a woman who may need them even more than they need her.
Misfits form their own opposing team to an elite peewee football team, coached by the elite team coach's brother.

An unconventional cop who doesn't take any bull, is paired up with an amazing detective to capture some powerful criminals but the cop soon realizes that his by the book partner has split personality disorder.
An impoverished backward nation declares a war on the United States of America, hoping to lose, but things don't go according to plan.
Clay Spencer is a hard-working man who loves his wife and large family. He is respected by his neighbors and always ready to give them a helping hand...
True story of the undersized Depression-era racehorse whose victories lifted not only the spirits of the team behind it but also those of their nation.
Carmen's caught in a virtual reality game designed by the Kids' new nemesis, the Toymaker (Stallone). It's up to Juni to save his sister, and ultimately the world.
A criminal subculture operates among U.S. soldiers stationed in West Germany just before the fall of the Berlin wall.

After a series of Broadway flops, songwriter Bert Hanley (Dixon) goes to work at a musical camp for young performers. Inspired by the kids, he finds an opportunity to regain success by staging an altogether new production.
This is the story of those who live as if every day was a constant Sunday, those who spend their Mondays in the sun. The story of people who worked in a dockyard but are now unemployed.
A terrorist hunter is hired by a scientist to deactivate her android double, a walking, talking, murderous nuclear bomb which has gone amok in the big city and is about to explode.
Agents force a former con man to help them nab a corrupt politician.
This movie is suppose to be a sequel to the movie which starred Jean-Claude Van Damme. Only now the...
When a bored Holmes eagerly takes the case of Gabrielle Valladon after an attempt on her life, the search for her missing husband leads to Loch Ness and the legendary monster.
An officially "dead" cop is trained to become an extraordinarily unique assassin in service of the US president.
A Mad Max-esque post apocalyptic world provides the backdrop for a brutal, futuristic game resembling football...
In comic Woody Allen's film debut, he took the Japanese action film "International Secret Police: Key of Keys" and re-dubbed it, changing the plot to make it revolve around a secret egg salad recipe.
An ex con teams up with federal agents to help them with breaking up a moonshine ring.
It's the wedding of Jim and Michelle and the gathering of their families and friends, including Jim's old friends from high school and Michelle's little sister.
The violent story about how a criminal lesbian, a tough-guy hit-man with a heart of gold, and a mentally challenged man came to be best friends through a hostage.
Four gay shorts are rolled into one 83-minute movie.
An introspective dentist's suspicions about his wife's infidelity stresses his mental well being and family life to the breaking point.
An overworked mother and her daughter do not get along. When they switch bodies, each is forced to adapt to the other's life for one freaky Friday.
An imprisoned drug kingpin offers a huge cash reward to anyone that can break him out of police custody and only the LAPD's Special Weapons and Tactics team can prevent it.
In the near future, Japan is ruled once more by a monarchy. But, rebels opposed to this rule seek to overthrow the government...
Surfers and secret spots from around the world are profiled in this documentary.
Insurance agent plots with client to kill her nutty husband.

One morning a young man wakes to find a small, disgusting creature has attached itself to the base of his brain stem. The creature gives him a euphoric state of happiness but in return demands human victims.
An obese, embittered nurse doesn't mind if her toupee-wearing boyfriend romances and fleeces other women, as long as he takes her along on his con jobs.
A elderly man and his dog struggle to survive on his government pension in Rome.
This documentary by Joe Berlinger and Bruce Sinofsky details the murder trial of Delbert Ward. Delbert...
Joey owns a pizza parlor, and is married to Rosalee, and is a major womanizer. Rosalee goes to extremes when she finds he has been cheating.
Freddy Krueger and Jason Voorhees return to terrorize the teenage population. Except this time, they're out to get each other, too.
Four skaters follow their idol on his summer tour in an attempt to get noticed, get sponsored, and become stars themselves.

The comedic misadventures of a person of indeterminable gender.

An investigator on the Moscow police force relentlessly pursues the solution to a triple homicide which occurred in Moscow's Gorky Park...
In Victorian England, a master criminal makes elaborate plans to steal a shipment of gold from a moving train.
A shipping disaster in the 19th Century has stranded a man and woman in the wilds of Africa. The lady is pregnant...

As the only relative to take over the Royal throne, a down on his luck American slob must learn the ways of the English.
A down and out cynical detective teams up with a down and out ex-quarterback to try and solve a murder...
A young Parisian woman meets a middle-aged American businessman who demands their clandestine relationship be based only on sex.

In 1929 French Indochina, a French teenage girl embarks on a reckless and forbidden romance with a wealthy, older Chinese man, each knowing that knowledge of their affair will bring drastic consequences to each other.
Unhappy Larry Burrows sees what his life could've been like, had he made that winning home run as a teenager.
A religious fanatic marries a gullible widow whose young children are reluctant to tell him where their real daddy hid $10,000 he'd stolen in a robbery.
Escaped convict Sam Gillen single handedly takes on ruthless developers determined to evict Clydie - a widow with two young children...
Lincoln Hawk (Stallone) is a struggling trucker who arm wrestles on the side to make extra cash while trying to rebuild his life...
An airline security expert must take action when he finds himself trapped on a passenger jet when terrorists seize control of it.
When the woman deputy prosecutor R.K. Sabich had an affair with is murdered the prosecutor asks him to lead the investigation. When Sabich digs too deeply he finds himself framed for the murder.

A misfit bunch of friends come together to right the injustices which exist in a small town.
Three thieves successfully rob a New York City bank, but making the escape from the city proves to be almost impossible.

A young woman develops a taste for human blood after undergoing experimental plastic surgery, and her victims turn into rabid, blood-thirsty zombies who proceed to infect others, which turns into a city-wide epidemic.

Louisa May Alcott's autobiographical account of her life with her three sisters in Concord Mass in the 1860s...

A hapless carnival performer masquerades as the court jester as part of a plot against an evil ruler who has overthrown the rightful king.
An all guts, no glory San Francisco cop becomes determined to find the underworld kingpin that killed the witness in his protection.
In 15th century France, a gypsy girl is framed for murder by the infatuated Chief Justice, and only the deformed bellringer of Notre Dame Cathedral can save her.

At first, Dr. Sidney Schaefer feels honored and thrilled to be offered the job of the President's Analyst...

An art director in the 1930's falls in love and attempts to make a young woman an actress despite Hollywood who wants nothing to do with her because of her problems with an estranged man and her alcoholic father.

A young drifter discovers his true calling when he's hired by a mobster to stalk and kill a prominent accountant, and then decides to seek revenge when the stingy thugs try to kill him rather than pay him.
A well meaning crack shot husband is pressured by his beautiful marksman wife to go on an interstate robbery spree, where he finds out just how depraved and deadly she really is.
Over-the-hill boxer Bill 'Stoker' Thompson insists he can still win, though his sexy wife Julie pleads with him to quit...
A headstrong young teacher in a private school in 1930s Edinburgh ignores the curriculum and influences her impressionable 12 year old charges with her over-romanticized world view.
When hired killer Philip Raven shoots a blackmailer and his beautiful female companion dead, he's is paid off in marked bills by his treasonous employer who is working with foreign spies.
An armored truck driver and his lovely ex-wife conspire with a gang to have his own truck robbed on the route.
King Louis XIV has without his knowledge a twin brother, Philippe, but when he is told, he immediately locks up his brother in the Bastille...
A military cadet who happens to be a social outcast taps into a way to summon demons and cast spells on his tormentors through his computer.
British agent Alec Leamas refuses to come in from the cold war during the 1960s, choosing to face another mission, which may prove to be his final one.
Sherlock Holmes and Doctor Watson must protect a Swiss inventor of an advanced bomb sight from falling into German hands.
Blacklisted in modern day WW2, a Swedish oil trader opts to assist British Allies, by means of infiltrating and surveying Nazi Germany.
Ramona works in a concert agency and is sent after the rock band 'Children of Paradise' who have disappeared...
Sherlock Holmes sets out to discover why a trio of murderous villains, including a dangerously attractive female, are desperate to obtain three unassuming and inexpensive little music boxes.
In the midst of the Gulf War, soldiers are kidnapped and brainwashed for sinister purposes.
When The Hood finds and invades International Rescue's secret base and traps most of the Tracy family, only young Alan Tracy and his friends can save the day.
The population of a small, isolated countryside village believe that their alliance with the mysterious creatures that inhabit the forest around them is coming to an end.
A quietly troubled young man returns home for his mother's funeral after being estranged from his family for a decade.
Zero-X, a manned exploration mission crashes during lift-off on its maiden flight. Two years later an...
From cult director Alex Cox (Repo Man; Sid and Nancy) comes this modernised adaptation of Thomas Middleton's celebrated play from 1607...
Over the course of one night, a team of cops frantically search for their colleague's missing gun.
A wily slave must unite a virgin courtesan and his young smitten master to earn his freedom.
Four relentless door-to-door salesmen deal with constant rejection, homesickness and inevitable burnout as they go across the country selling very expensive bibles to low-income Catholic families.

A cab driver finds himself the hostage of an engaging contract killer as he makes his rounds from hit to hit during one night in Los Angeles. He must find a way to save both himself and one last victim.
A futuristic 'Brief Encounter', a love story in which the romance is doomed by genetic incompatibility.
An army major, himself guilty of cowardice, is asked to recommended soldiers for the Congressional Medal of Honor during the Mexican Border Incursion of 1916.
A group of a run-down Tokyo high school students face the struggles of growing up, growing apart from their friends and worrying about their future, while living in a highly violent environment.
An Asian-American office worker and his Indian stoner friend embark on a quest to satisfy their desire for White Castle burgers.
Now settled in Genovia, Princess Mia faces a new revelation: she is being primed for an arranged marriage to an English suitor.
An Aussie becomes a national sensation when he lifts off in his deck chair tied to balloons.

During an archaeological expedition on Bouvet√∏ya Island in Antarctica, a team of archaeologists and other scientists find themselves caught up in a battle between the two legends. Soon, the team realize that only one species can win.

Underneath the sands of Egypt, Anubis, an ancient evil spirit, has awakened. It's up to Yugi, who defeated Anubis centuries ago, to use his skill and determination to rid the world of evil once again.
After their friend dies, three men decide to fulfill their childhood promise by going on a camping expedition for the lost D.B. Cooper bounty, with calamitous results.

Years before Father Lancaster Merrin helped save Regan MacNeil's soul, he first encounters the demon Pazuzu in East Africa. This is the tale of Father Merrin's initial battle with Pazuzu and the rediscovery of his faith.
Band singer/race driver Mike McCoy must choose between marrying a beautiful rich girl and driving her father's car in a prestigious race.
American singer Johnny Tyrone is enlisted by sinister forces to assassinate an Arab king whose daughter he has fallen in love with.

Rich socialite Chantal marries Eugene, a photographer, and everything seems blissful until her envious friend attempts to break them up. In desperation, she turns to her mother, but the advice she receives may do more harm than good.
The 35-hour work week has all of France in its thrall. This film turns it into a feature about economic and familial politics...
A concert film in which Bill Cosby discusses weekends, raising children, dentists, and many other situations.
A scientific expedition sets out for Borneo to seek a flower called the Blood Orchid, which could grant longer life. Meanwhile, they run afoul of snakes and each other.
A mysterious serial killer is hunting other serial killers - and one FBI agent suspects there may be more to the vigilante than they imagine.

A Chinese emissary is sent to the Gobi desert to execute a renegade soldier. When a caravan transporting a Buddhist monk and a valuable treasure is threatened by thieves, however, the two warriors might unite to protect the travelers.
Growing up poor in London, Becky Sharp (Witherspoon) defies her poverty-stricken background and ascends the social ladder alongside her best friend, Amelia.
A rising Hollywood actor decides to take personal revenge against a group of four persistent photographers to make them pay for almost causing a personal tragedy involving his wife and son.
A young Chicago advertising executive believes a woman he sees in a caf√© is his long-lost love. His belief leads to obsession, as he puts his life on hold in order to trail her.
A recently widowed woman is on the road with her precocious young son, determined to make a new life for herself as a singer.
Rennie Cray (Caviezel) embarks on a bloodthirsty rampage to avenge the death of his wife who was struck down by a serial killer - a man who hunts and kills women using his '72 El Dorado.
A character study of five young men at crucial turning points in their lives in a small town in Italy.
After being discredited as a coward, a 19th century seaman (Peter O'Toole) lives for only one purpose: to redeem himself. Based on Joseph Conrad's novel written in 1900.
On the night of Halloween, 10 teens decide to go to a party at an abandoned funeral parlor. "Hull House"...
A woman (Kitaen) finds an interest in her friend Brandon's Ouija Board when he brings it by her party.
Musical set in the 'future', e.g. 1994. A young couple enters the world of the music industry, but also the world of drugs.
A group of smart-talking toddlers find themselves at the center of a media mogul's experiment to crack the code to baby talk. The toddlers must race against time for the sake of babies everywhere.
A young man receives an emergency phone call on his cell phone from an older woman. The catch? The woman claims to have been kidnapped; and the kidnappers have targeted her husband and child next.

Alice awakes in Raccoon City, only to find it has become infested with zombies and monsters. With the help of Jill Valentine and Carlos Olivera, Alice must find a way out of the city before it is destroyed by a nuclear missile.

After New York City receives a series of attacks from giant flying robots, a reporter teams up with a pilot in search of their origin, as well as the reason for the disappearances of famous scientists around the world.
After being told that their children never existed, a man and woman soon discover there is a much bigger enemy at work.
An uptight, middle-aged, repressed woman turns into a sex addict after getting hit on the head, and she then falls into an underground subculture of sex addicts in suburban Baltimore.
The dramatization of a motorcycle road trip Che Guevara went on in his youth that showed him his life's calling.

A man decides to turn his moribund life around by winning back his ex-girlfriend, reconciling his relationship with his mother, and dealing with an entire community that has returned from the dead to eat the living.
An emotionally remote recovering alcoholic and his dowdy, unambitious wife face a personal crisis when they take in an attractive lodger.
In 1935, when his train is stopped by deep snow, detective Hercule Poirot is called on to solve a murder that occurred in his car the night before.
A teenager with a massive facial skull deformity and biker gang mother attempts to live as normal a life as possible under the circumstances.
This send-up of ragtime song and dance begins in 1915 San Francisco when society boy Roger Grant decides to pursue popular rather than serious music.
A series of brutal murders in Boston sparks a seemingly endless and increasingly complex manhunt.
A man picked randomly out of a crowd is made the target of CIA survelliance and pursuit.
Not ready for marriage, a fashion model moves into an unbelievably nice Brooklyn Heights apartment, where scary occurrences turn into a much more frightening turn of events.
David, a college student, is looking for a job. He is hired by Dr. Stoner as a lab assistant for his research and experiments on snakes...
A millionaire and a million-dollar prostitute, a star-maker and a nation-killer, a woman whose lusts are as cold as graveyard snow...

Duane recovers from his delusional breakdown to find his freakish basket-bound brother Belial will soon become a father. But not everything is joyous as the once tight knit brothers no longer seem to trust each other.
Duane and his basket-bound mutant brother are taken in by a secret home for wayward freaks with journalists hot on their tail.
A hunter squares off against a killer whale seeking vengeance for the death of its mate.
A conservative Midwest businessman ventures into the sordid underworld of pornography in California to look for his runaway teenage daughter who is making porno films in California's porno pits.
An extremely bigoted white man finds out the hard (and somewhat humorous) way what it's like being a black man, firsthand!
A young officer in Napoleon's army pursues a mysterious woman to the castle of an elderly Baron.
Christopher Columbus' discovery of the Americas and the effect this has on the indigenous people.

A New York University professor returns from a rescue mission to the Amazon rainforest with the footage shot by a lost team of documentarians who were making a film about the area's local cannibal tribes.
When a son of a gangster shark boss is accidently killed while on the hunt, his would-be prey and his vegetarian brother both decide to use the incident to their own advantage.
Under the watchful eye of his mentor Captain Mike Kennedy, probationary firefighter Jack Morrison matures...

A husband-and-wife team play detective, but not in the traditional sense. Instead, the happy duo helps others solve their existential issues, the kind that keep you up at night, wondering what it all means.
A mouthy and feisty taxicab driver has hot tips for a green and inept cop set on solving a string of New York City bank robberies committed by a quartet of female Brazilian bank robbers.
Four friends/fledgling entrepreneurs, knowing that there's something bigger and more innovative than the different error-checking devices they've built, wrestle over their new invention.

A female theatre dresser creates a stir and sparks a revolution in seventeenth century London theatre by playing Desedmona in Othello. But what will become of the male actor she once worked for and eventually replaced?
A romantic comedy where a bored, overworked Estate Lawyer, upon first sight of a beautiful instructor, signs up for ballroom dancing lessons.

Popular Broadway actor Gary Johnston is recruited by the elite counter-terrorism organization Team America: World Police. As the world begins to crumble around him, he must battle with terrorists, celebrities and falling in love.
A black comedy that follows three generations of a family, who come together for the funeral of the patriarch - unveiling a litany of family secrets and covert relationships.
An unfulfilled divorced woman gets the chance to relive her past when she meets a young man who appears to be her high school sweetheart who died many years before.
A director hires an alcoholic has-been and strikes up a stormy relationship with the actor's wife, who he believes is the cause of all the man's problems.

A strong-willed young peasant girl becomes the affection of two men.
A noted professor and his dim-witted apprentice fall prey to their inquiring vampires, while on the trail of the ominous damsel in distress.
About a filmmaker not only revisiting, but also recreating (not in a conventional sense) one of his first films, The Perfect Human / Det perfekte menneske (1967)
The Davies expect a baby, which turns out to be a monster with a nasty habit of killing when it's scared. And it's easily scared.
Hallie and Ethans divorced mother is about to remarry. When Hallie goes to visit Santa Claus, she asks for an unusual gift - she wants her parents back together again.
Based on H.G. Bissinger's book, which profiled the economically depressed town of Odessa, Texas and their heroic high school football team, The Permian High Panthers.

Filmmaker Jonathan Caouette's documentary on growing up with his schizophrenic mother -- a mixture of snapshots, Super-8, answering machine messages, video diaries, early short films, and more -- culled from 19 years of his life.
Set in a world with memory implants, Robin Williams plays a cutter, someone with the power of final edit over people's recorded histories. His latest assignment is one that puts him in danger.
When a man finds out his mother is dying and tries to hitchike his way to the hospital, he is picked up by a stranger with a deadly secret.
A lonely, obnoxious young millionaire pays a family to spend Christmas with him.
An American nurse living and working in Tokyo is exposed to a mysterious supernatural curse, one that locks a person in a powerful rage before claiming their life and spreading to another victim.
A cockney womanizer learns the hard way about the dangers of his actions.
Two men reaching middle age with not much to show but disappointment, embark on a week long road trip through California's wine country, just as one is about to take a trip down the aisle.
An industrial worker who hasn't slept in a year begins to doubt his own sanity.
Abortionist Vera Drake finds her beliefs and practices clash with the mores of 1950s Britain--a conflict that leads to tragedy for her family.

Two men awaken in the secure lair of a killer who forces them to play a deadly game that will determine life or death.

The story of the life and career of the legendary rhythm and blues musician Ray Charles, from his humble beginnings in the South, where he went blind at age seven, to his meteoric rise to stardom during the 1950s and 1960s.
A family of undercover superheroes, while trying to live the quiet suburban life, are forced into action to save the world.
A young boy embarks on a magical adventure to the North Pole on the Polar Express. During his adventure he learns about friendship, bravery, and the spirit of Christmas.

A look at the life of Alfred Kinsey, a pioneer in the area of human sexuality research, whose 1948 publication "Sexual Behavior in the Human Male" was one of the first recorded works that saw science address sexual behavior.
The story of what happens after a master thief achieves his last big score, when the FBI agent who promised he'd capture him is about to do just that.
After finding love, Bridget Jones questions if she really has everything she's dreamed of having.
The story of 's friendship with a family who inspired him to create Peter Pan.
A historian races to find the legendary Templar Treasure before a team of mercenaries.
An examination on the effect of Franco-era religious schooling and sexual abuse on the lives of two longtime friends.
SpongeBob SquarePants takes leave from the town of Bikini Bottom in order to track down King Neptune's stolen crown.
Alexander, the King of Macedonia and one of the greatest military leaders in the history of warfare, conquers much of the known world.
With their daughter away, the Kranks decide to skip Christmas altogether until she decides to come home, causing an uproar when they have to celebrate the holiday at the last minute.
The relationships of two couples become complicated and deceitful when the man from one couple meets the woman of the other.
A romantic police captain breaks a beautiful member of a rebel group out of prison to help her rejoin her fellows, but things are not what they seem.
Daniel Ocean recruits one more team member so he can pull off three major European heists in this sequel to Ocean's 11.
Blade, now a wanted man by the FBI, must join forces with the Nightstalkers to face his most challenging enemy yet: Dracula.
An examination of political consultant Karl Rove's influence on George W. Bush's candidacy.
Film adaptation of the George Abbott Broadway musical about a Washington Senators fan who makes a pact...
Various MGM stars from yesterday present their favourite musical moments from the studio's 50 year history.

An Arizona logger mysteriously disappears for five days in an alleged encounter with a flying saucer in 1975.
A love story between two psychopaths that turns into a dare-or-not-dare game.

A documentary on perception of the United States's war with Iraq, with an emphasis on Al Jazeera's coverage.
A historical view of witchcraft in seven parts and a variety of styles. First, there is a slide-show...
In fifteenth century Paris, the brother of the archdeacon plots with the gypsy king to foment a peasant revolt. Meanwhile, a freakish hunchback falls in love with the gypsy queen.
A film projectionist longs to be a detective, and puts his meagre skills to work when he is framed by a rival for stealing his girlfriend's father's pocketwatch.
A mad, disfigured composer seeks love with a lovely young opera singer.
The rise and inevitable fall of an amoral but naive young woman whose insouciant eroticism inspires lust and violence in those around her.
Hopelessly in love with a woman working at MGM Studios, a clumsy man attempts to become a motion picture cameraman to be close to the object of his desire.
The effete son of a cantankerous riverboat captain comes to join his father's crew.
A surrealistic film with input from . Director  presents stark, surrealistic...

A surrealist tale of a man and a woman passionately in love with one another, but their attempts to consummate that passion are constantly thwarted by their families, the Church, and bourgeois society.
Seeking shelter from a storm, five travelers are in for a bizarre and terrifying night when the stumble upon the Femm family estate.
An ambitious and near insanely violent gangster climbs the ladder of success in the mob, but his weaknesses prove to be his downfall.
A traveler obsessed with the supernatural visits an old inn and finds evidence of vampires.
A newspaper man, his jilted fianc√©e, and his lawyer hatch an elaborate scheme to turn a false news-story into the truth, before a high-society woman can sue for libel.
Longfellow Deeds, a simple-hearted Vermont tuba player, inherits a fortune and has to contend with opportunist city slickers.
A waitress, a hobo and a bank robber get mixed up at a lonely diner in the desert.

A young man falls in love with a girl from a rich family. His unorthodox plan to go on holiday for the early years of his life is met with skepticism by everyone except for his fianc√©e's eccentric sister and long suffering brother.
A servant in the house of Wuthering Heights tells a traveler the unfortunate tale of lovers Cathy and Heathcliff.
Humble Abraham Lincoln gains the respect of his Illinois neighbors, growing in stature and respect until he is elected President in 1860 and departs for Washington.
The wife of a rubber plantation administrator shoots a man to death and claims it was self-defense, but a letter in her own hand may prove her undoing.

Geoffrey Thorpe, a buccaneer, is hired by Queen Elizabeth I to nag the Spanish Armada. The Armada is waiting for the attack on England and Thorpe surprises them with attacks on their galleons where he shows his skills on the sword.
A group of ivory-tower lexicographers realize they need to hear how real people talk, and end up helping a beautiful singer avoid police and escape from the Mob.
Boxer Joe Pendleton dies 50 years too soon due to a heavenly mistake, and is given a new life as a millionaire playboy.
An amnesiac World War I vet falls in love with a music hall star, only to suffer an accident which restores his original memories but erases his post-War life.

An American tanker is sunk by a German U-boat and the survivors spend eleven days at sea on a raft. They're next assigned to the liberty ship "Sea Witch" bound for Murmansk through the sub-stalked North Atlantic.
An old rou√© arrives in Hades to review his life with Satan, who will rule on his eligibility to enter the Underworld.
Documentary about the 25th and last bombing mission of a B17, the "Memphis Belle". The "Memphis Belle"...
A dramatized account of the role of the American PT Boats in the defense of the Philippines in World War II.
A humble orphan suddenly becomes a gentleman with the help of an unknown benefactor.
The famed slugger is played by Bendix, who resembles Ruth slightly in looks and not at all in baseball ability...
At Fort Apache, an honorable and veteran war captain finds conflict when his regime is placed under the command of a young, glory hungry lieutenant colonel with no respect for the local Indian tribe.
Fascinated by gorgeous Mrs. Bannister, seaman Michael O'Hara joins a bizarre yachting cruise, and ends up mired in a complex murder plot.
Amid a semi-documentary portrait of New York and its people, Jean Dexter, an attractive blonde model...
Carrie boards the train to Chicago with big ambitions. She gets a job stitching shoes and her sister's...
Depicts the early life of the legendary warrior Musashi Miyamoto; his years as an aspiring warrior, an outlaw and finally a true samurai.
American girls dream of finding romance in Rome, but there is none for secretaries, Anita tells her replacement at the USDA...
Two rival motorcycle gangs terrorize a small town after one of their leaders is thrown in jail.
The history of Nazi Germany's death camps of the Final Solution and the hellish world of dehumanization and death contained inside.
It is the summer of 1941. An eastern-Finnish machine gun company receives an order to turn in their surplus equipment...
Charles 'Slim' Lindbergh struggles to finance and design an airplane that will make his New York to Paris flight the first solo transatlantic crossing.
James Gannon, the hardboiled city editor of a newspaper, believes that the only way to learn the business is by way of the School of Hard Knocks...
A submarine commander is forced to blow up a Japanese ship with prisoners.
Einar and Eric are two Viking half-brothers. The former is a great warrior whilst the other is an ex-slave...
As a conscript in war-time Japan's military, a pacifist struggles to maintain his determination to keep his ideals.
The head of a Japanese theatre troupe returns to a small coastal town where he left a son who thinks he is his uncle, and tries to make up for the lost time, but his current mistress grows jealous.
A vengeful young man marries the daughter of a corrupt industrialist in order to seek justice for his father's suicide.
In Argentina, the family man Julio Madariaga is the patriarch of his family and considers his farm the paradise on Earth...
His ideals challenged by life as a conscript in war-time Japan's military, a pacifist faces ever greater tests in his fight for survival.
Senate investigation into the President's newly nominated Secretary of State, gives light to a secret from the past, which may not only ruin the candidate, but the President's character as well.

An elder ronin samurai arrives at a feudal lord's home and requests an honorable place to commit suicide. But when the ronin inquires about a younger samurai who arrived before him things take an unexpected turn.
A con man comes to a Midwestern town with a scam using a boy's marching band program, but things don't go according to plan.
The Bounty leaves Portsmouth in 1787. Its destination: to sail to Tahiti and load bread-fruit. Captain...
A young woman meets a vital young man, but their love affair is doomed because of the man's materialistic nature.
George Washington McLintock, "GW" to friends and foes alike, is a cattle baron and the richest man in the territory...

The fashion industry and Paris provide the setting for a comedy surrounding the mistaken impression that Joanne Woodward is a high-priced call girl. Paul Newman is the journalist interviewing her for insights on her profession.
An English king comes to terms with his affection for his close friend and confidant, who finds his true honor by observing God's divine will rather than the king's.
An aging, reclusive southern belle, plagued by a horrifying family secret, descends into madness after the arrival of a lost relative.
Surprised that their contract victim didn't try to run away from them, two professional hit men try to find out who hired them and why.
Kelly, a prostitute, finds redemption in the town of Grantville, where she arrives working as a medium-time seller...
Two women kill samurai and sell their belongings for a living. While one of them is having an affair with their neighbor, the other woman meets a mysterious samurai wearing a bizarre mask.
In prohibition-era Chicago, the corrupt sheriff and Guy Gisborne, a south-side racketeer, knock off the boss Big Jim...
In the 1950s, fear and violence escalate as the people of Algiers fight for independence from the French government.
Repelled by the commercialism he sees around him, Charlie Brown tries to find the true meaning of Christmas.
Norwegian resistance tries to stop German troops to produce an atomic bomb component during WW2. Based on a true story.
In a North African military prison during World War II, five new prisoners struggle to survive in the face of brutal punishment and sadistic guards.
A naval officer reprimanded after Pearl Harbor is later promoted to rear admiral and gets a second chance to prove himself against the Japanese.
In 1944, a German colonel loads a train with French art treasures to send to Germany. The Resistance must stop it without damaging the cargo.
The life, times and afflictions of the fifteenth-century Russian iconographer.
The story of a mistreated donkey and the people around him. A study on saintliness and a sister piece to Bresson's Mouchette.
The Dynamic Duo faces four super-villains who plan to hold the world for ransom with the help of a secret invention that instantly dehydrates people.
After an Egyptian army, commanded by British officers, is destroyed in a battle in the Sudan in the 1880's...
Documentary covering Bob Dylan's 1965 tour of England, which includes appearances by Joan Baez and Donovan.
Fando and his partially paralyzed lover Lis search for the mythical city of Tar. Based on Jodorowsky's memories of a play by surrealist Fernando Arrabal.

Monsieur Hulot curiously wanders around a high-tech Paris, paralleling a trip with a group of American tourists. Meanwhile, a nightclub/restaurant prepares its opening night, but it's still under construction.
After being double-crossed and left for dead, a mysterious man named Walker single-mindedly tries to retrieve the rather inconsequential sum of money that was stolen from him.
A mysterious woman persuades two cowboys to help her in a revenge scheme.
Chicago February 14th 1929. Al Capone finally establishes himself as the city's boss of organised crime...

Tony Rome, a tough Miami PI living on a houseboat, is hired by a local millionaire to find jewelry stolen from his daughter, and in the process has several encounters with local hoods as well as the Miami Beach PD.
A couple in the south of France non-sequentially spin down the highways of infidelity in their troubled ten-year marriage.
The story of a man who was shot, robbed and imprisoned who returns to steal a large gold shipment from the man who wronged him. The gold is transported in an armored stage coach, the War Wagon.
Popular animated hero Asterix and his faithful sidekick Obelix travel to ancient Egypt to help Cleopatra build a new summer home...
A thirty-something square falls in love with a hippie and decides to "drop out" himself.

Thinking this will prevent war, the US government gives an impenetrable supercomputer total control over launching nuclear missiles. But what the computer does with the power is unimaginable to its creators.
In the Old West a little boy witnesses the murder of his family by gunmen and grows up with plans to track them all down, and kill them.
The rigid principles of a devout Catholic man are challenged during a one-night stay with Maud, a divorced woman with an outsize personality.
In turn-of-the-century Mississippi, an 11-year-old boy comes of age as two mischievous adult friends talk him into sneaking the family car out for a trip to Memphis and a series of adventures.
Various tales in the lives of Tokyo slum dwellers, including a mentally deficient young man obsessed with driving his own commuter trolley.
Two teenagers fall in love over the summer, in spite of cynical and disapproving adults who dismiss their relationship as being nothing but young love.
Daisy Gamble, an unusual woman who hears phones before they ring, and does wonders with her flowers...
While imprisoned in a Confederate girls boarding school, a Union soldier cons his way into each of the lonely women's hearts.

In 17th-century France, Father Urbain Grandier seeks to protect the city of Loudun from the corrupt establishment of Cardinal Richelieu. Hysteria occurs within the city when he is accused of witchcraft by a sexually repressed nun.
A business commuter is pursued and terrorized by a malevolent driver of a massive tractor-trailer.
Joe, a young American soldier, is hit by a mortar shell on the last day of World War I. He lies in a hospital bed in a fate worse than death...
The story of Manfred von Richtofen, the german air ace during the World War I and his truggle with the enemy aces and some jealous german officers.
A mysterious black-clad gunfighter wanders a mystical Western landscape encountering multiple bizarre characters.
The vengeful Doctor rises again, seeking the Scrolls of Life in an attempt to resurrect his deceased wife.
A man, his wife, and their friend, stage a bloody bank robbery, unaware they are stealing money from the Mob.
In the far reaches of space, a small crew, 20 years into their solitary mission, find things beginning to go hilariously wrong.
Rogue intelligence agents, right-wing politicians, greedy capitalists, and free-lance assassins plot and carry out the JFK assassination in this speculative agitprop.
Based on the life of Tennessee sheriff Buford Pusser whom almost single-handily cleaned up his small town of crime and corruption, but at a personal cost of his family life and nearly his own life.
The wife of a French diplomat in Bangkok, Emmanuelle embarks on a voyage of sexual discovery.
A collection of skits that make fun of 1970s television, featuring early appearances by Chevy Chase and Richard Belzer.
A documentary of the conflicting attitudes of the opponents of the Vietnam war.
In a corrupt, greed-fueled world, a powerful alchemist leads a Christ-like character and seven materialistic figures to the Holy Mountain, where they hope to achieve enlightenment.
Emmanuelle returns to her husband in Hong Kong and proceeds to have several extramarital affairs -- with his knowledge...
"Popeye" Doyle travels to Marseille to find Alain Charnier, the drug smuggler who eluded him in New York.
Former football player and present private detective Harry Moseby gets hired on to what seems a standard missing person case...
A frustrated war correspondent, unable to find the war he's been asked to cover, takes the risky path of co-opting the I.D. of a dead arms dealer acquaintance.
Two reporters, Tracy and Chuck, get a message from a third one who discovered something about "Futureworld"...
A filmed account of a bitterly violent miner strike.

Tom Logan is a horse thief. Rancher David Braxton has horses, and a daughter, worth stealing. But Braxton has just hired Lee Clayton, an infamous "regulator", to hunt down the horse thieves; one at a time.
A reverent depiction of the life of Christ using the Gospel accounts.
A documentary about a pet cemetery in California, and the people who have pets buried there.
Andras Varda grows up in a turbulent, war-torn Hungary, where he procures local girls for the occupying G.I.'s during World War II...

A werewolf loose in Los Angeles changes the lives of three young adults, who, after being mauled by the beast, learn they must kill their attacker if they hope to change their fate to avoid becoming werewolves too.
Four actors compete for the role of Jesus - a black revolutionary, a bisexual hippie, a Jew, and a feminist...

Disgraced Navy SEAL Shane Wolfe is handed a new assignment: Protect the five Plummer kids from enemies of their recently deceased father -- a government scientist whose top-secret experiment remains in the kids' house.
Disenchanted with the movie industry, Chili Palmer tries the music industry, meeting and romancing a widow of a music executive on the way.

American soldiers of the 2/3 Field Artillery, a group known as the "Gunners," tell of their experiences in Baghdad during the Iraq War. Holed up in a bombed out pleasure palace built by Sadaam Hussein, the soldiers endured hostile situations some four months after President George W. Bush declared the end of major combat operations in the country.
A failed police negotiator turned small town cop, must save the lives of a family held hostage, which draws him into a much more dangerous situation.
In a robot world, a young idealistic inventor travels to the big city to join his inspiration's company, only to find himself opposing its sinister new management.
In San Francisco, one victim in a mass murder is a police detective. His partner and a new partner investigate in the city's seamy side.
Jeb Ward is an attorney who specializes in whistle blower, David vs. Goliath, type cases. He finds a...
Relatives of an eccentric millionaire gather in his spooky mansion on the 20th anniversary of his death for the reading of his will.
Three bored Long Island buddies seek excitement on the streets, with perilous results.
A rebellious young British bowls player teams with another older and more traditional player to take on the Australian bowls team.
The biographical story of Michelangelo's troubles while painting the Sistine Chapel at the urging of Pope Julius II.
A "prequel" of sorts to "Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid," chronicling the two outlaws' lives in the years before the events portrayed in the Newman/Redford movie.
A young mouse, mole and hedgehog risk their lives to find a cure for their badger friend, who's been poisoned by men.
A flamboyant Broadway impresario who has fallen on hard times tries to get his former lover, now a Hollywood diva, to return and resurrect his failing career.

Col. Mike Kirby picks two teams of crack Green Berets for a mission in South Vietnam. First off is to build and control a camp that is trying to be taken by the enemy the second mission is to kidnap a North Vietnamese General.

With the help of her coach, her parents, and the boy who drives the Zamboni machine, nothing can stop Casey (Trachtenberg) from realizing her dream to be a champion figure skater.
Two alternating stories about Melinda's (Mitchell) attempts to straighten out her life.
After Cheryl Frasier and Stan Fields are kidnapped, Gracie goes undercover in Las Vegas to find them.
A sarcastic father (Mac) has plenty to say about his daughter wanting to marry a white boy (Kutcher).
Filmmaker Christopher Browne documents the mission of a group of middle-aged bowlers as they attempt to revitalize the sport and get the television-watching public interested in it again.

Three Italian-American brothers, living in the slums of 1940's New York, try to help each other with one's wrestling career using one brother's promotional skills and another brother's con-artist tactics to thwart a sleazy manager.
Chicago reporter P.J. McNeal re-opens a ten year old murder case.
Through his unconscionable actions against others, a sociopath samurai builds a trail of vendettas that follow him closely.

Uncle Joe is ageing. He's also a millionaire. That's why his family is trying so very hard to get into his good books...
Three Devil's Island escapees hide out in the home of a kindly merchant and repay his kindness by helping him and his family out of several crises.
In the Paris of the late 19th century, Louise, wife of a general, sells the earrings her husband gave...

The odd biography of a man who has Tourette's Syndrome, chronic bad luck, menial jobs, nudist tendencies, and a book of "fakts" hung around his neck.
A film that explores the dark and miserable town, Basin City, and tells the story of three different people, all caught up in violent corruption.
Gina is a hairstylist who opens up a beauty shop full of employees and customers more interested in speaking their minds than getting a cut.
A french girl gifted with a great voice, has a complex about her weight and her appearance.

Master explorer Dirk Pitt goes on the adventure of a lifetime of seeking out a lost Civil War battleship known as the "Ship of Death" in the deserts of West Africa while helping a WHO doctor being hounded by a ruthless dictator.
Lindsay is stuck in the middle of her relationship with Ben and his passion for the Boston Red Sox.

The story of one shepherd's long and successful singlehanded effort to re-forest a desolate valley.
Frank loses his memory after being shot in small desert town in Texas. As he tries to retrace his steps and figure out his true identity...
The story of Japanese-American soldiers who fought in Europe during World War II.
A dramatization of Nazi Germany's final Western Front counterattack of World War II.
In this prequel to Ring, a young Sadako becomes an actress in hopes of escaping her troubled past. But strange visions and terrifying powers begin to manifest...
Two brothers must negotiate changing roles and shifting family dynamics when one is sent to war in Afghanistan.
Young Vincent Malloy dreams of being just like Vincent Price and loses himself in macabre daydreams which annoys his mother.

During World War II, 12-year old Ivan works as a spy on the eastern front. The small Ivan can cross the German lines unnoticed to collect information...
A group of astronomers go on an expedition to the moon.
Just north of London live Wendy, Andy, and their twenty-something twins, Natalie and Nicola. Wendy clerks in a shop...

Mere seconds before the Earth is to be demolished by an alien construction crew, journeyman Arthur Dent is swept off the planet by his friend Ford Prefect, a researcher penning a new edition of "The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy."
A nightclub singer seeks refuge with gay nuns on dope in a Madrid convent.
A classical art professor and collector, who doubles as a professional assassin, is coerced out of retirement to avenge the murder of an old friend.
